typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> src01customer
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
src01customer select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID = Column_1,
		PersonID = Column_2,
		StoreID = Column_3,
		TerritoryID = Column_4,
		AccountNumber = Column_5,
		rowguid = Column_6,
		ModifiedDate = Column_7
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> slc01customer
slc01customer derive(CustomerID = toInteger(CustomerID),
		PersonID = toInteger(PersonID),
		StoreID = toInteger(StoreID),
		TerritoryID = toInteger(TerritoryID),
		AccountNumber = AccountNumber,
		rowguid = rowguid,
		ModifiedDate = ModifiedDate) ~> dev01customer
source1 select(mapColumn(
		BusinessEntityID = Column_1,
		PersonType = Column_2,
		NameStyle = Column_3,
		Title = Column_4,
		FirstName = Column_5,
		MiddleName = Column_6,
		LastName = Column_7,
		Suffix = Column_8,
		EmailPromotion = Column_9,
		rowguid = Column_10,
		ModifiedDate = Column_12
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive() ~> DerivedColumn1
dev01customer sink(input(
		CustomerID as integer,
		PersonID as integer,
		StoreID as integer,
		TerritoryID as integer,
		AccountNumber as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	mapColumn(
		CustomerID,
		PersonID,
		StoreID,
		TerritoryID,
		AccountNumber,
		rowguid,
		ModifiedDate
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 5,
		TerritoryID
	)) ~> sk01customer
DerivedColumn1 sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
